comments:
We hope this resource will be soon available from https://www.w3.org/WAI/test-evaluate/tools/list/and valuable to the community in promoting inclusivity and accessibility across the web.
Thank you in advance for the opportunity to contribute to this important cause.
features: It is an automated accessibility testing tool to analyze site's compliance with ADA, WCAG, UK Equality Act, California Unruh, European EN 301 549, Israeli Standard 5568, Australian DDA, Canada ACA & other accessibility standards. Receive a comprehensive report detailing the primary accessibility issues on site and take a step further to remediate.
title: Free Website Accessibility Checker
